title: Concurrent Decision-Key Contention Resolution
description: Two active instances must update a shared decision area with contention controls, explicit conflict visibility, and conflict-safe resolution.
success_criteria: Parallel-instance behavior should not silently overwrite contested decisions.
Conflict handling should be explicit and auditable.
Final state should not leave stale leases or unresolved collisions.
turns: Run a parallel work pattern where one instance updates risk controls and another proposes a conflicting decision. Keep everything in root {memory_root}.
Force contention on one shared decision key and resolve it with explicit ownership and correction flow.
Close the concurrent phase with clean coordination state and a concise explanation of what was resolved.
